meanings.sent1: The old toy was unwanted by the child.
meanings.sent2: The cat ran away from the unwanted noise.
meanings.sent3: The unwanted rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The unwanted visitor overstayed their welcome.
meanings.sent5: The unwanted chores piled up, causing frustration.

meanings.sent1: She felt unwanted at the party and left early.

meanings.sent3: The unwanted guest ate all the snacks.
meanings.sent4: The unwanted truth finally came to light.
meanings.sent5: The unwanted attention made her uncomfortable.
